new-account.subject: Welcome to Foto
new-account.body: Thank you for signing up to Foto. If you need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

duplicate-user.subject: Important! Your Foto Account
duplicate-user.body: We noticed you have already registered an account, so we used your original password to save you any confusion in the future.

new-plan.subject: Your Foto Plan
new-plan.body: Thank you for selecting the {{content.plan}} plan. Your card has been successfully charged {{content.price}}.

new-user.subject: Welcome to Foto
new-user.body:
Thank you for signing up to Foto, you can now sign in. 
 If you need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

plan-updated.subject: Your billing plan has been updated
plan-updated.body: This is confirmation that your billing plan has been successfully updated to the {{content.plan}} plan.

card-updated.subject: Your credit card has been updated
card-updated.body: This is confirmation that your credit card has been updated. If you didn't change your card, please let us know.

account-closed.subject: We're sorry to see you go
account-closed.body:
This is confirmation that your account has been closed and all of your data has been removed from our servers. 
 If you change your mind, you can create a new account any time.

invite-accepted.subject: Your friend accepted your invite
invite-accepted.body: Woohoo! {{content.friend}} has accepted your invitation to join your team.

password-updated.subject: Your password has been changed
password-updated.body:
Your new password has been saved. 
 If you didn't change your password, please contact us and let us know.

password-reset.subject: You requested a password reset
password-reset.title: Forgot your password?
password-reset.body: Click the link below to reset your password.

invite.subject: Your friend has invited you to use Foto
invite.body: Your friend {{content.friend}} has invited you to join his team on Foto. Sign up now to start working with {{content.friend}}.

help.subject: New support message
help.body:
{{content.username}} has sent you a new message.

{{content.message}}

new-signin.subject: New sign in to Foto
new-signin.body: We noticed a new sign in to your account. If this wasn't you, please change your password.
